name: Caldwell - Montrose - Montrose
additionalNotes: Part of Caldwell's experimental Crafted & Curated series, the Montrose puts a tasty twist on the popular Long Live The King cigar blend. Swapping out the Long Live The King's original wrapper with a Nicaraguan Habano leaf, the Montrose is filled out with a Dominican Corojo binder and Dominican and Nicaraguan fillers to deliver a smooth smoke with beautifully complex earthy and nutty character.
